Package uk.mqchinee.archelia.gui.item

Class LoopableItem

java.lang.Object
uk.mqchinee.archelia.gui.item.MenuItem
uk.mqchinee.archelia.gui.item.LoopableItem
public class LoopableItem extends MenuItem
A loopable item in a graphical user interface (GUI).

This class extends the MenuItem class and represents an item in a GUI that can loop through a list of ItemStack objects and change its appearance after a certain number of ticks. The item will update itself automatically and call a provided Consumer on each update.
